Ever Evolving, Community Driven, Free

GlPortal is a free engine and computer game that is developed in colaboration with developers, artists and fans from all over the world.

We blend.

We use Blender for all of our assets and our map editor is a Blender plugin. If you are a Blender enthusiast, contact us to join our team.

We use blender

for all of our assets and the GlPortal map editor is a Blender plugin. If you are a Blender enthusiast, contact us to join our team.

Download 0.0.7.1 Source Code Join Us Report a Bug

GlPortal is a free as in freedom game and game engine for GNU/Linux, Windows and Mac OS X.

The player has to solve puzzles with the help of teleportation and physics manipulation.

Overview

  • Join the Team
  • Take a look
  • Discover the Story

Features

  • Free and open game and engine
  • Enthusiastic community
  • Active Developers
  • Challenging Tasks

Join the Team

GlPortal works through the contributions of team members around the world. You can add your skills to the mix and help shape the open source world permanently.
